text: Yesli dve gruppy veruyushchikh srazhayutsya mezhdu soboy, to primirite ikh. Yesli zhe odna iz nikh pritesnyayet na druguyu, to srazhaytes' protiv toy, kotoraya pritesnyayet, poka ona ne vernetsya k poveleniyu Allakha. Kogda zhe ona vernetsya, to primirite ikh po spravedlivosti i bud'te bespristrastny. Voistinu, Allakh lyubit bespristrastnykh
